title: My speaker will not work during phone calls. And I no longer can use earbuds during phone calls as w
content: I called Google assistance Ken was very helpful transferred to IT, Patrick gave a patronising oh your phone to little hot unplug it don't use it for a little while. Did not I repeat did not do anything about the speaker issue or the headphone issue
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
